channel.title: Court Wizard Rework Survey
channel.description:
Doing a survey to see which Court Wizard people prefer. Results may impact which one is decided upon.
[Click here to take the survey.](https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/FLFBB7W)
> # [color=steblue]Court Wizard 1 (Type Empower Based)[/color] > * Day Ability - Siphon (2 uses) – Gain protection the next two nights based on the target’s class type. Can't target same player twice. You will not know what you get. > Offensive / Special – CW will be occupation immune > Killer / Support – CW will be death immune > Social / Investigative – CW will be conversion immune > > * Day Ability - Mimic (2 uses) - Your next empower will give additional effects based on said target’s class type in addition to its normal effects. You will not know what you get. > Offensive / Special – Empower target will be occupation immune > Killer / Support – Empower target will be death immune > Social / Investigative – Empower target will be conversion immune > > * Night Ability - Empower (unlimited uses) – Give a target a boost tonight based on the target’s class type. Will give additional feedback if it actually helps the player. > Killer – Target will be death immune > Offensive – Target’s abilities bypass occupation immunity. (Honestly need something different) > Support – Target will be guaranteed to visit their intended target (Bypasses occupation, visit prevention, etc.) > Social – Target will be conversion immune > Investigative – Target’s abilities will return correct results regardless of counter abilities (frame, etc) > Special - Nothing > > * Night Ability - Tornado (2 uses) - Swap players. Bypasses redirection immunity.
> # [color=steblue]Court Wizard 2 (Teleport Based)[/color] > * Day Ability - Magical Barrier (4 uses) - Make a player conversion immune tonight > > > * Night Ability - Teleport (unlimited uses) - Force anyone attacking your first target to attack the second instead. Notifies you if it redirects an attack. > > * Night Ability - Tornado (2 uses) - Swap players. Bypasses redirection immunity.
> # [color=steblue]Court Wizard 3 (Generic Empower Based)[/color] > * Day Ability - Magical Barrier (4 uses) - Make a player conversion immune tonight > > * Night Ability - Empower (unlimited uses) - Guarantee your target's ability is successful and accurate. (Bypasses occupation, visit prevention, frame, etc.) Notifies you if it bypasses anything. > > * Night Ability - Tornado (2 uses) - Swap players. Bypasses redirection immunity.
> # [color=steblue]Court Wizard 4 (Magical Barrier Based)[/color] > * Day Ability - Ice Ward (2 uses) - Encase another player in a shroud of ice, preventing all others from visiting them tonight. > > * Night Ability - Magical Barrier (unlimited uses) - Prevents negative effects tonight and during the day tomorrow. Makes target conversion immune tonight. Notifies you if it blocks anything tonight or tomorrow. > > * Night Ability - Tornado (3 uses) - Swap players. Bypasses redirection immunity.

item.title: Court Wizard Rework Survey
item.dc:creator: Ulkesh
item.description:
RawkHawk:

That sounds like the most useless thing ever still.

First, a killing class must be attacking the hunter.

Then the hunter must use bear.

Then a healer must target the killer.

Finally the cw has to target the hunter.

I can do one better:
There must be 2 Court Wizards in game
One must target a Healer
The Healer must target a player that is jailed.
The other Court Wizard must target the Prince
The Prince must decide to execute his prisoner

My initial idea was to give no empower to Killer classes. But that seemed a bit lame, so I came up with a very situational buf. In short: The Court Wizard probably does not want to target Killer classes. For instance: A buf on a Butler is far more useful. This is deliberate. Some classes have less use for Empowers since their impact is pretty decent already. Also, this makes the choice who to Empower as Court Wizard far more relevant.

item.title: Court Wizard Rework Survey
item.dc:creator: Ulkesh
item.description:
While I really like the idea of 1, it is a bit complicated as a whole, and rather OP as well.

Can we have the love child of option 1 and 2?

Day Ability - Magical Barrier (4 uses) - Make another player conversion immune tonight
Night Ability – Empower (Unlimited uses) – Empower another player based on class type.
Night Ability - Tornado (2 uses) - Swap players. Bypasses redirection immunity.

Empower will bestow a bonus for that night on the target based on their class type. Note that it can help Unseen/Cult when used on them. A Court Wizard would do good to avoid that just like a Physician would do good to avoid healing Unseen/Cults.

Support: Target will be guaranteed to visit their intended target (Bypasses occupation, redirection, visit prevention, etc.)
Social: Becomes conversion immune
Offensive: Becomes death immune
Special: Will appear as Blue Dragon
Investigative: Will always get accurate results (immune to Warp, Frame, etc.)
Killer: Their attacks cannot be healed

The target will only get a feedback message if the empower was relevant that night.
